created_time: June 17, 2022, 09:24:34 PMLast edit: February 03, 2023, 04:22:27 PM by MrCryptHodl
content: 5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingot pt.2Hello everyone ! i hope you all are fine !!after a short wait here is the second auction of the 5oz GENESIS ingots !  next week the rest of the ingots arrive, the auction will be followed by 10 ingots per auction, they will end on the auction of edition 1, 2 and 3.as explained in the last auction, only 50 ingots were mint ! It's a 5oz fine silver 999.9 ingot! 95x75mm! on the face of this one you can see the legendary front page of The Times newspaper of January 3, 2009 with some modification to be adapted to the molding !At the back you can find the large version 1HoDLCLUB certification pad! the square next to this one at each laser-engraved BTC public address, each public key start with "1GENESiS.." ! in the center you can find the first made 1HoDLCLUB hologram(can be called the Genesis hologram  ) with it's window, and on the window you can see the number of the ingots and below the private key! !Each ingot is loaded with 0.021 BTC as shown on the rear of the ingot.all 5oz ingots are auctioned because the demand is very high compared to the number of mint. so that everyone can have an equal chance !Good luck to everyone !  5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingotMintage : 50 [6 auctionned here, 10 auctionned at May 23, 2022] Material : 999.9 Fine SilverSize : 95x75mmThickness : 2.30mmWeight : 5ozDenomination : 0.021BTC Serial auctionned today:  ; 36/50 ; 38/50 ; 40/50 ; 47/50 ; 48/50 ; 49/50   Starting Bid : (the bidding don't include the loading)Each lot bears the serial number of the ingots at auctionLot#36 : 0.036BTCLot#38 : 0.036BTCLot#40 : 0.036BTCLot#47 : 0.036BTCLot#48 : 0.036BTCLot#49 : 0.036BTCMinimum Bid Increments: 0.001BTCLoading : the loading amount of 0.021 BTC are not included in the bidding,it should be added to this one at the end of the auction during the payments!BTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngAuction Ends: June 19, 2022 @ 9pm UTCCountdown:5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingot COUNTDOWNSniping:  No sniping, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutesShipping: 16$ [Priority + Tracking] Reference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address36      1GENESiSC1FZU2s7emgqcDTrxWduMjZfKU38      1GENESiS2pjLm99Ati5zKuFtLYj46Dhpy640      1GENESiS3snuj8JWjN7Ci6uP1FjRKuFPmh       47      1GENESiSzcxEKj4ViNBbtEdUR66uvvVudY 48      1GENESiSsXSJvxEzABmVfiXEgyGiBGw4p1 49      1GENESiSZychtGvddQHbR9qAw6Ar7QMAhG 1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store OPEN!Twitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me
